title: Should Shamorie Ponds Go to St. John's?
text: Should Shamorie Ponds Go to St. John's? Ryan Foley RedStormReport.com Chris Mullin, Barry Rohrssen , and Matt Abdelmassih are three smart, hard-working men who know quite a bit about basketball. However, they are selling an idea.
